steps.instruction: Now let's display the weather instead of your name. Select the text block with your name inside and remove it. Tip: you can remove blocks by hitting backspace on your keyboard or by dropping them on the trash bin
In the 'Weather' section grab the temperture block and put it where your name was before
In the 'Weather' section grab the temperture block and put it where your name was before
As you can see, the temperature block needs another block. This block will tell to the temperature block what city we want the temperature from. Grab a text block and plug it to the temperature block

Now enter in the block you just added the name of a city

Your app is almost done, we need a last thing. You now need to tell your app to get the weather from the web. To do that, grab the refresh block in the Weather section and add it underneath your blocks
